arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Preston North End as 'class act' stands out by a mile - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley once again lacked a cutting edge in the final third as they were held to a frustrating 0-0 draw at home to local rivals Preston North End.

arts.ttl: 'Nobody could begrudge us': Preston North End boss delivers his verdict on Burnley stalemate
arts.sum: Paul Heckingbottom felt no-one could have begrudged his Preston North End side had they come away from Burnley with three points.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction to Burnley's 'lethargic' derby stalemate with Preston North End
arts.sum: Scott Parker spoke of his disappointment after his Burnley side were held to a “lethargic” derby stalemate against Preston North End.

arts.ttl: Feisty Lancashire derby finishes level as Burnley miss chance to go top
25 images of Burnley fans arriving at Turf Moor for Championship fixture against Lancashire rivals Preston North End
arts.sum: Burnley fans have arrived at the Turf for the Championship fixture against Preston North End.

arts.ttl: Injured duo return to the bench as Burnley name starting line-up for Preston North End derby
arts.sum: Scott Parker has named an unchanged Burnley side for the first time this season for today’s lunchtime kick-off against Preston North End.

arts.ttl: Burnley v Preston North End: Team news, predicted teams and TV details as Clarets look to stretch unbeaten run
arts.sum: Burnley will be looking to claim a second home win in the space of just five days when they host local rivals Preston North End.

arts.ttl: 'Knows his way around this league': Burnley boss Scott Parker speaks of respect for Preston North End counterpart
arts.sum: Scott Parker has spoken of his respect for his Preston North End counterpart Paul Heckingbottom ahead of today’s Lancashire derby.

arts.ttl: Championship outfit snap up former Burnley, Luton Town and Watford man on short-term deal
arts.sum: Plymouth Argyle have snapped up former Burnley man Andre Gray on a short-term deal until January.
